page.title: 10 Shops in Silverton
page.content:
The shops in Silverton include a butcher, two general stores, a Post Office, a newsagent, a garden shop, an art gallery, and a second hand shop.
We asked children to answer a questionnaire on where their parents shopped, what transport they used for their shopping and if there were any particular reasons for using these shops.
We found the most popular shop in Silverton to be the Spar general stores, and the least used was Bob's (second hand) shop.
When shopping out of the village we found that most people used cars, rather than public transport.
